attributes.action: STOP ALL imigrants from EASTERN Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: They put nothing into our society as all their money is being sent 'home' to their relatives.They can claim faMily allowance for children in their 'home'country.Iam fed up of walking around my home town and hearing Polish AND OTHER LANGUAGES being spoke.We have a population of 100 thousand residents in Taunton 13000 ARE from EASTERN europe,no new schools or hospitals have been built,they get prioty in the social housing sector.Is this what our forefathers fought for and the crime rate has gone up,our prisons were overcrowded before what are the like now?SEND THESE PEOPLE BACK and LET NO MORE IN

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
